website_summaries.verdict: A great value for a robust processor and graphics card that uses liquid cooling.
pros: Includes liquid cooling system to prevent overheating
Processor easily keeps up with newer games on high settings
cons: Customers report minor quality control issues, such as keyboard arriving with malfunctioning keys

customer_reviews.title: Love this PC
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to drop a quick note about how much I love this PC. It is a real beast. If there is something that I wish was better/different it is is the small and relatively slow SSD drive. Why CyberPower would skimp on a Western Digital Green drive into this level of machine, is a bit of an enigma to me but - you live you learn. The regular HD, though, tears it up anyway so I backed away of the hassle of swapping SSD out for now.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping for everything

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming computer
customer_reviews.text: Truly plug and play. Computer unpacked and was operational in just a few minutes! The gaming mouse ambient light is hit and miss whether it works, all other items are awesome! This is my families 3rd CyberpowerPC and still a very satisfied customer! Thank you! Great computer for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Casey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic PC For Price Especially For Streamers
customer_reviews.text: This is a very powerful computer that is fantastically priced due to the current pc building market. It has enough power to run pretty much anything at max settings and stream the game to Twitch or Youtube. If you are a hard core gamer and or streamers looking to upgrade your rig this is a wonderful place to look as you can't even get as good a deal building it yourself these days. The Ryzen 7 chip is better for streaming so if you want it for just gaming I would suggest looking into all the options Cyber Power gives here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: highly efficient and fast  system
customer_reviews.text: Computer Works Right out of the box. Setup was easy and quick. Case is Built well and does come with Keyboard and Mouse which are quite nice. I had to order some cable and adaptors, in order to be able to connect 4 monitors. Over all very happy so far with the system and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Pourkaviani

customer_reviews.title: This PC is AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a BEAST!!! It can run all my games at extreme settings like nothing else!!! It’s a bit larger than what I expected but otherwise one of the best purchases of my life!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Buchler

customer_reviews.title: Very Impress
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy after open the box, Been through many PC. This one the best I ever own. Value for money, Performance and look good at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: chhour01

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gaming PC
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this PC from Amazon and couldn't be happier. It was bigger than I expected, but that's on me as the dimensions were listed and I overlooked that info. I've been able to run every game on it smoothly without a loss of frames. Definitely a worthy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Teng Xiong

customer_reviews.title: A beast.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had any problems. Runs games beautifully. Looks sexy while doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Easy. Quiet and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Setting up was a snap. Everything worked as advertised. Quiet family computer easily capable of running intensive games for kids.
customer_reviews.author: George Kulick

customer_reviews.title: OOOOFFFF
customer_reviews.text: so far, this gaming computer has performed flawlessly, really fast setup, and silent as hell! i love my new and first desktop!!!! Worth every $$
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C.

customer_reviews.title: Fast gaming desktop, a good embedded set hardware for beginner.
customer_reviews.text: This gaming desktop is super fast. I am a beginner, so I filter specification first. I really like the spec and the price of this computer. I've been using the computer for a week. The hardware really pays off, the AMD CPU really way better than Intel. The Nvidia GTX 1080 GPU performed perfectly. I am not a fan of storage, so a 240 GB SSD is small, for good enough for boot up, and 2 TB HHD is good enough for storing data. I didn't think I used up the 32 GB memory, which means it is over qualified. Overall, this is one computer you don't want to miss.
customer_reviews.author: YHS

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This computer is overpriced! This company at least could have used an RTX card. Im building a PC and im using faster and better parts. My PC cost rounds up to $3,500 and im getting and i9-9900k and a Nvidia Geforce RTX 2080 ti.
customer_reviews.author: Concepcion Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great PC
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice Gaming PC at a Nice price and found this. After some time I loved it also it's pretty big.
customer_reviews.author: David

product_meta.title: CYBERPOWERPC Liquid Cool SLC8540A Gaming PC Desktop (AMD Ryzen 7 2700X 3.7GHz, NVIDIA GTX 1080 8GB, 32GB DDR4, 2TB HDD, 240GB SSD & Win 10 Home) Black
product_meta.description: Get the pinnacle of gaming performance with the CYBERPOWERPC Gamer Supreme series of gaming computers. The Gamer Supreme series features monstrous processing power combined with the latest and greatest graphics cards to handle even the most demanding games on the market. An immense RAM allows you to easily tackle system-intensive applications such as video editing, and ensures a lag-free multitasking experience. A lightning-fast SSD boot drive provides quick load times for your most used games and applications, while a 2TB hard drive provides ample room for your videos, music and other media. The Gamer Supreme series looks as stunning as it performs, as all these high-end components are packaged in a striking, sleek chassis.
feature_bullets: System: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X 3.7GHz Eight-Core | AMD X370 Chipset | 32GB DDR4 | 2TB HDD | 240GB SSD | Genuine Windows 10 Home 64-bit
Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 8GB Video Card | 1x DVI | 1x HDMI | 1x DisplayPort
Connectivity: 2 x USB 3.1 | 6 x USB 3.0 | 2 x USB 2.0 | 1x RJ-45 Network Ethernet 10/100/1000 | 802.11AC Wi-Fi | Audio: 7.1 Channel | Keyboard and Mouse
Special Feature: Liquid Cooling | 802.11AC Wi-Fi | RGB 7 Colors Gaming Keyboard | Tempered Glass Side Case Panel
Warranty: 1 Year Parts & Labor Warranty Free Lifetime Tech Support
